error TS2349: This expression is not callable.
  Type '{}' has no call signatures.
error TS2351: This expression is not constructable.
  Type '{}' has no construct signatures.
typeParameterWithInvalidConstraintType.ts(1,19): error TS2313: Type parameter 'T' has a circular constraint.
typeParameterWithInvalidConstraintType.ts(4,19): error TS2339: Property 'foo' does not exist on type 'T'.


!!! error TS2349: This expression is not callable.
!!! error TS2349:   Type '{}' has no call signatures.
!!! error TS2351: This expression is not constructable.
!!! error TS2351:   Type '{}' has no construct signatures.
==== typeParameterWithInvalidConstraintType.ts (2 errors) ====
    class A<T extends T> {
                      ~
!!! error TS2313: Type parameter 'T' has a circular constraint.
        foo() {
            var x: T;
            var a = x.foo();
                      ~~~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'foo' does not exist on type 'T'.
            var b = new x(123);
            var c = x[1];
            var d = x();
        }
    }
